songs.title: Who’s Kissing You Tonight
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I don't think of you every day and night
I got things to do, yeah, I'm doin' alright
So, I can't explain why in times like these
I nearly go insane, when you're not here with me

[Chorus]
Oh, I know it's really over and you're never comin' back
And there's no way that I can make it right
Still I wonder, oh, I wonder, oh, baby, I can't help but wonder
Who's kissin' you tonight?

[Verse 2]
Oh, it's the jealousy that's hurtin' me so
Why can't I let it be, why can't I just let go?
Oh, but the thought of you somewhere with someone else
Doin' what we used to do, feelin' what we felt

[Chorus]
Oh, I know it's really over and you're never comin' back
And there's no way that I can make it right
Still I wonder, oh, I wonder, oh, baby, I can't help but wonder
Who's kissin' you tonight?

[Chorus]
Oh, I know it's really over and you're never comin' back
And there's no way that I can make it right
Still I wonder, oh, I wonder, oh, baby, I can't help but wonder
Who's kissin' you... who's kissin' you tonight?

[Outro]
Who's holdin' you tight?
Aw, Who's kissin' you tonight?
